mapper.insert: insert into zq_job_attach( object_id, job_id, sheet_id, user_id, status, creator_id, created_timestamp, last_modifier_id, modified_timestamp ) values( #{objectId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jobId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sheetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
